title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 207.15 - Birth and death certificates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 207.15 - Birth and death certificates

State Regulations
(a) A birth certificate shall be filed
upon an application for letters of guardianship or an order of
adoption. (b) A death
certificate shall be filed upon an application for letters testamentary, letters of administration or voluntary administration. Alternate evidence of
death may be accepted in the discretion of the court. (c) Birth and death certificates
may be required to be filed in any other proceeding in the discretion of the
court. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
207.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
